document.webtitle: Wendys vs. Taco Bell? - Yahoo! Answers
document.description: Taco Bell!!!! they have much more of a selection ... wansnt tht good though because the cashier was ... but Taco Bell actually was number 1 in fast food restaurant ...

Resolved Question Show me another » Wendys vs. Taco Bell?
5 years ago Report Abuse by helseych... Member since: April 04, 2007 Total points: 1,936 (Level 3) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker Taco Bell!!!! they have much more of a selection!! my fav is the mexican pizza!! 5 years ago Report Abuse Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: **** WENDY'S Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo! Add to Del.icio.us RSS
There are currently no comments for this question.

Other Answers (24) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by DeMaurie H Member since: July 26, 2007 Total points: 137 (Level 1) Add Contact Block I think that Taco Bell is better than Wendys because wendys sandwiches are spuare and nasty. 5 years ago Report Abuse by secretke... Member since: January 05, 2007 Total points: 14,900 (Level 6) Add Contact Block wendys 5 years ago Report Abuse by Shelly Member since: July 18, 2007 Total points: 630 (Level 2) Add Contact Block I work at Wendy's but greatly prefer Taco Bell. 5 years ago Report Abuse by Lynn Member since: July 23, 2006 Total points: 4,421 (Level 4) Add Contact Block mmmm chalupas 5 years ago Report Abuse by princesa... Member since: December 19, 2006 Total points: 1,537 (Level 3) Add Contact Block Wendy fries. That is all I would eat off their menu. And NEVER eat at Taco Bell. 5 years ago Report Abuse by Buttery (__|__) Biscuits Member since: August 16, 2006 Total points: 12,592 (Level 6) Add Contact Block Wendy's, that bacon burger is good! 5 years ago Report Abuse by Andrew Member since: September 08, 2006 Total points: 24,914 (Level 6) Add Contact Block Taco Bell 5 years ago Report Abuse by viv Member since: April 02, 2006 Total points: 2,316 (Level 3) Add Contact Block Hard question! I like the salads in Wendy's and love the Mexican Pizza in Taco bell. 5 years ago Report Abuse by alane Member since: May 20, 2006 Total points: 1,636 (Level 3) Add Contact Block Wendys 5 years ago Report Abuse by Sweetie™ Member since: May 28, 2006 Total points: 5,868 (Level 5) Add Contact Block I love both. But i'd prefer Wendy's Spicy Chicken Sandwich anyday. 5 years ago Report Abuse by self-exp... Member since: June 07, 2007 Total points: 3,779 (Level 4) Add Contact Block im not sure ever since there have been incidents at both resturants. 2- 3 years ago a finger was found in someone's chili ( even though it turned out the woman had put it in there) and my aunt had taken me to taco bell and the serbice wansnt tht good though because the cashier was rude and impolite 5 years ago Report Abuse by Jessica G Member since: July 17, 2007 Total points: 115 (Level 1) Add Contact Block I like the spicey chicken burger and the chicken nuggets at Wendy's. There hamburgers though ... horrible. The"baconator"is disgusting, never eat it.
As for Taco Bell, I don't eat there. I prefer diarrhea free nights. 5 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by Windflow... Member since: June 23, 2007 Total points: 308 (Level 2) Add Contact Block Wendys 5 years ago Report Abuse by neewom4 Member since: April 07, 2007 Total points: 214 (Level 1) Add Contact Block Taco Bell. Best food to eat while drunk, period. 5 years ago Report Abuse by Dylan D... Member since: July 23, 2007 Total points: 7,695 (Level 5) Add Contact Block Taco Bell is exquisite to me. Wendys has not been good to me of late. I had the baconator= too greasy and the triple stacker= just gross. Taco Bell has never let me down. 5 years ago Report Abuse by ctelly22 Member since: April 14, 2007 Total points: 26,176 (Level 7) Add Contact Block Wendy's, a frosty and some fries are all you need. 5 years ago Report Abuse by John J Member since: April 24, 2007 Total points: 1,957 (Level 3) Add Contact Block I prefer a hamburger but Taco Bell actually was number 1 in fast food restaurant cleanliness... 5 years ago Report Abuse by Ell Member since: July 07, 2006 Total points: 789 (Level 2) Add Contact Block wendys spicy chicken sandwich..... wendys over taco bell anyday 5 years ago Report Abuse by LUCKY509 Member since: June 06, 2007 Total points: 1,422 (Level 3) Add Contact Block I'M NOT A HUGE FAN OF EITHER BUT IF I HAD TO CHOOSE IT WOULD BE WENDY'S. TACO BELL IS DISGUSTING. FAKE MEXICAN FOOD WITH NO MEAT. ALL THEY SERVE YOU IS TONS OF LETTUCE WHAT THE HELL WHERE'S THE MEAT!! AN INSULT TO REAL MEXICAN COOKING 5 years ago Report Abuse by goldiest... Member since: September 11, 2006 Total points: 593 (Level 2) Add Contact Block Wendys 5 years ago Report Abuse by Amy S Member since: July 26, 2007 Total points: 104 (Level 1) Add Contact Block Wendy 5 years ago Report Abuse by God Gave Rock'n'Roll Member since: July 20, 2007 Total points: 710 (Level 2) Add Contact Block Wendy i dont like no dam tacco 5 years ago Report Abuse by kerryoun... Member since: July 18, 2007 Total points: 305 (Level 2) Add Contact Block sorry but there both bad i can eat at aether one but would rather not 5 years ago Report Abuse by zackie00... Member since: July 18, 2007 Total points: 1,326 (Level 3) Add Contact Block Both, they are great.
Wendy's is good fresh foods.
Taco Bell is good Mexico foods. 5 years ago Report Abuse
